name: Place For Children
description:
"Welcome, new employee, to "Place for Children", where we do and/or make things intended for children!

He's the face of Place for Children, "Mascot"! He was originally designed by our founder, in order to create a character that sits just right in the uncanny valley so that it is appealing to kids, but creepy to those of you on the night shift.

Speaking of the night shift, that's where you come in! Your job is to perform some scheduled maintenance on Mascot, and I promise you that it is a really easy job that will not cause any stress! (this is foreshadowing.)"

This game is a parody of all the post-fnaf indie horror games that stick to the cliches of "children's establishment with humanoid mascot character that tries to kill you".
